name: Miserable Little Holiday
description:
What a joyous holiday Christmas is, but here in Miserable Little Holiday, there is one who is not so happy. You play as a grumpy kid, who hates Christmas, and the last thing you want is for everyone else to get gifts instead of you! So off you go in the dead of night, ruining everyone else's gifts to make your Christmas that much more enjoyable.

This simple Point-And-Click game is easy to learn, and fun to play!

This game was made for the Jame Gam | Christmas Special.

Made By: Natalie Cordeiro
